import React, { Component } from 'react'; class CartBody extends Component{ constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { numproduct:0, config: { headers: { 'Authorization': `Bearer ${localStorage.getItem('token')}` } } } } stepDown = ()=>{ this.setState({ numproduct: this.state.numproduct - 1 }); } stepUp =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); this.setState({ numproduct: this.state.numproduct + 1 }); } render(){ return(
Image Product Available Quantity Price Action
Product Name Dada In stock
124,90 €
Sub-Total 255,90 €
Shipping 6,90 €
Total 346,90 €
{/* content */}
); } } export default CartBody;
